title: From Here the Tragedy Started, from "The Amman Project"
marks: Signature, Date, Edition and Chop LRC, in pencil: [D. Heyman 2006]
description: line drawing-style portrait of a man with a moustache and double chin, with a mole on his PL cheek; text above head, at bottom and across chest
creditline: Gift of funds from Allen Brookins-Brown
